message: Looks as if the defecting Engadget crew has found amnesty at SB Nation.

A couple things struck me right away. First Josh came out swinging against AOL content farm tactics. And second it seemed odd that one of the major attractions for the crew appeared to be a better content management system.
I really wonder how Engadget will do without Josh...
They survived (thrived) without two prior iconic editors - Peter and Ryan  - my prediction is that people will forget about the departures quickly.
Well, Engadget is pretty popular, so I think they will sustain for awhile
